headline: After outcry, Vance moves Sunday's Marjorie Taylor Greene event from Loveland to Mason
author: Scott Wartman
sentences:
What happened at the event:At Vance rally, Marjorie Taylor Greene calls vax mandates 'worst thing that has ever happened to America'
The event has been moved from the Landing Event Center in Loveland to the Marriott Cincinnati Northeast in Mason.
The U.S. House removed Greene from her committee assignments in February 2021 for incendiary and conspiratorial social media posts, including support for the baseless QAnon conspiracy theory.
The Mason-Deerfield Township Democratic Club and others have shared a link encouraging people to call the Marriott, reserve seats to take up space and ask the Mason mayor to take a stand.
"Due to the tremendous interest in the JD Vance presentation that was scheduled to take place here this Sunday, it has been relocated to the Marriott NE located in Deerfield Twp.
